column4: easy question: how do i figure out my IP address (i don't have a router)?
ifconfig
are you connect by ethernet card or modem?
i have an always on internet connection. so i think this means ethernet.
so what exactly do you want?
i'd like to know my pc's ip address.
give both ips please
is it safe to give another person my ip addresses? isn't it like giving out your real home's address?
there is an internet ip (external) and if you are connected to networks there is an internal ip adress
most likely your ip is dynamic wich means it changes, in a maximum period of 36 hours
if you ask that you arent :)
what makes you think my ip is dynamic?
please explain what you mean by it not being safe .
the thing thing
in windows with no firewall they can
dont worry you are safe in ubuntu unless you are the big boss of kgb or cia or something like that :D
but i think this is not the right place for those questions...you can     sudo apt-get install amule      and search in there for network book...they can teach you a lot more than i
it google.com

amule perhaps?... :D just install it and run it
